short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know what time you can leave the office

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Leave At" Extension is something you guys would love to use because,I am sure many of you think of what will be your Office leaving time as soon you enter your office and scan the bio-metric system or login into your work station and this chrome extension will exactly tell you what you are willing to know.

You just have to Set Your Office Time Duration in hours and minutes by going to options page and save the details and the extension will use this time to calculate your today's office leaving time

So, to use this extension you will have to click this extension's icon which will be on the right hand side of your address bar and just enter the time you scanned the bio-metric or logged into your system and press enter, you will get your office leaving time.

The following are a few examples of the time you can type and how the extension understands them:

Input	Output (using the default format)
1234	 12:34 AM
1030       10:30 AM
1234p	 12:34 PM
456	 	 04:56 AM
1656	 04:56 PM
1:1 P	 1:10 PM
1:9 A	 1:09 AM
8:59	        8:59 AM
12030	 1:20:30 AM
46	 	 05:00 AM (it's interpreted as 4 hours plus 60 minutes)


Hope you guys like it!!
If yes don't forget to rate this extension and give your precious feedback.
